import React from 'react' import allblog from '../blogdata/blog.json' import { useParams } from 'react-router' import AllPostListSidebar from './AllPostListSidebar'; // export default BlogDetailsPage = () => { export default function BlogDetailsPage() { var { slug } = useParams(), post = findPostBySlug(slug); console.log(post) const { blogCategory, blogTitle, postedOn, author, blogImage, blogText } = post return (
{/* */}

{blogTitle}

We offer a great place to work for all our associates by providing the best facilities,
rewards & growth programs on a continual basis to support both, your personal and professional growth.

About Us

My name is Hardik Devani, I am a software developer specialization in Front end developement.

) } function findPostBySlug(slug) { return allblog.data.find(myslug => myslug.slug === slug); }
